Name: Horde Slayer
About the game: Horde Slayer is a horde survival game. It is your new action roguelite where you play as a wizard that was trapped in a dungeon filled to the top with snakes. Your death is inevitable but you have decided to take away with you as many slithering snakes as you can. Featuring CURVED PROCEDURALLY GENERATED DUNGEONS and beautiful snakes animations and many spells to try. Explore many complex procedural generated caverns filled with danger and struggle to survive stronger, fas ter and bigger snakes as the game progresses. The player must explore the cavern in search of spells that will help him fight the hordes. There are 25 different spells to find. Be constantly aware of the surroundings to not get trapped.
